name: Phykon Solutions
tag_list: bpo-services, software-services, contact-center, call-center, chat-support, email-support, technical-support, accounting-and-auditing-services, i-phone-application-development, quality-analysis-and-testing, social-media-support
overview:
Phykon Solutions (P) Ltd was founded in 2006 with a vision to provide the best outsourcing solutions to businesses all over the world. Phykon’s Management has over 30 years of combined experience from leading outsourced services providers in the country. Phykon’s corporate office is an excellent state of the art facility located at Technopark Trivandrum. Over the years, Phykon Solutionssucessfully provided quality IT/ITES services to companies across four continents and in countries like Australia, UK, US and Canada.

Outsource to Phykon and help us help you transform and improve the way your business works. We present you with indisputable care and a large resource pool that you can tap for the betterment of your business or operation.

Phykon Solutions has developed a work culture, unique to companies in its niche. This unique work culture has given a sense of Corporate Citizenship among our employees. Team Phykon is working hard towards helping you perform your business more efficiently and more effectively.
